citations.desc: CLEANING, SANITIZATION, HOUSEKEEPING, AND PEST CONTROL.
citations.narrative:
Item Housekeeping 3.11c
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the ceiling in clean side of the cage washer was peeling. This can
cause clean cages to be contaiminated by falling paint after they have cleaned.
Facility needs to repair surface so as insure clean cages are not contaiminated and maintain good husbandry
practices.
Correct by 4/17/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection
